name: Way of the DAO Cap
description: This is the way of the DAO. To balance power with style. Force DAO is a collective of investment strategists working to identify and productize alpha across DeFi for yield automation. This fashion isnâ€™t just ordinary fashion. It onboards you into an entire world of NFTs, Decentralized Finance, Crypto and Web3. Every fashion piece is a unique NFT that can also earn you yield in $MONA token and other crypto. We are melting the centralized exploitative crown to weave the fabric of a generative ecosystem.

attributes.value: Fashion x DeFi, Wear to DeFi
